thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan: Kajol and I are the worst best dancers in the world - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shah Rukh Khan: Kajol and I are the worst best dancers in the world
text:
While shooting Rohit Shetty's "Dilwale" in Hyderabad , superstar Shah Rukh Khan made an "honest confession" that he and his co-star Kajol are the world's "worst best dancers".*Kajol and Shah Rukh Khan*
The 49-year-old "Happy New Year" actor filmed a dance sequence with Kajol, 41.
"There's nothing I like more than working. A ... Â»
